item.description:
This pub crawl will start in the North End and finish at the Green Dragon.
Here is the plan:

2pm Waterfront
3pm Fiore Roof deck
4pm Sailoft
6pm Tia's
7pm Point
8pm Green Dragon

I haven't organized shirts this time because I didn't have time. The Green Dragon doesn't lake pub crawls so when we get there we will just send people in small groups 5 - 10 minutes apart. The Green Dragon is a good one to finish at because it has live music and won't have a cover if we get there before 9. If the Green Dragon doesn't work out we have a backup plan which involves finishing at Mr Dooleys, an Irish bar with music towards the financial district.

Please update your rsvps.

PLEASE BRING YOUR PASSPORT OR MASS ID. YOU WILL NOT GET INTO BARS WITHOUT THIS!!!

Here are some cell phone numbers incase you have trouble finding us.
Amy 617 840 5142
Steve 978 289 2364
KC 617 372 3664
Cheers,
Amy

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Aussie Pub Crawl
